Our Ministry @ethiop_mot along with the active engagement of all stakeholders has finalized the development of Ethiopia’s 30-Years Integrated Transport Master Plan #ETMP30! The launching of this National Transport Master Plan will be held on November 10, 2022.

Investing in active mobility is about bringing efficient land utilization in our cities & bringing lively & vibrant neighborhoods. In addition @ethiop_mot’s Transport Sector 10 Years Perspective Plan calls for 3,000km of NMT facilities in Addis as well as other cities.

In order to realize the contents of our active mobility strategy, we have established an NMT steering & technical committees. We set a target to build 430km of pedestrian infrastructure & more than 300 km of cycling tracks in the secondary cities of our country🇪🇹. 

3/4

Ethio-Djibouti Railway will transport export materials from industrial parks & export manufacturing industries
that come through Mojo dry port to Djibouti free of any charge for subsequent three months with a possible extension of offer until 5 months as of May 1/2020.

5/5

Export manufacturing industries who do not use railway services due to location distances will be provided with transport services for their export freights with 50% discount. 

4/5

Dedicated transport services will be provided for freights with 50% discounted price from Hawassa to Mojjo. And a 73% discount will be provided for manufacturing sector exports using @ESLSE_ for their exports.

3/5

2/5
